thread.title: Halloween Game vs South Carolina to Kick at 11 a.m.
thread.title_full: Halloween Game vs South Carolina to Kick at 11 a.m.

author: Zach Taylor
title: Halloween Game vs South Carolina to Kick at 11 a.m.
text:
Home » Sports » Halloween Game vs South Carolina to Kick at 11 a.m. Halloween Game vs South Carolina to Kick at 11 a.m. Posted by Zach Taylor Sports Monday, October 19th, 2015 
Texas A&M’s Oct. 31 game against South Carolina inside the newly-redeveloped Kyle Field will kick at 11 a.m., the league office announced Monday. 
The Aggies and Gamecocks will be broadcast on either ESPN or the SEC Network, with that decision coming after this weekend’s games. 
Full Oct. 31 TV schedule is below. 
Oct. 31 TV Selections (all times Central) 11:00 AM – Ole Miss at Auburn OR South Carolina at Texas A&M (ESPN)* 11:00 AM – Ole Miss at Auburn OR South Carolina at Texas A&M (SEC Network)* 2:30 PM – Georgia vs Florida (CBS) 3:00 PM – UT Martin at Arkansas (SEC Network) 6:00 PM – Vanderbilt at Houston (ESPN2 or ESPNU)* 6:30 PM – Tennessee at Kentucky (SEC Network) 
* network decided following games of Oct. 24. Times will not change. 
Story courtesy of Texas A&M Athletics
